sentence: Hamas  killed  about  1,200  people  and  took  240  hostages  in  its  surprise  attack  on  southern  Israel  on  7  October.
According  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  Gaza,  more  than  25,000  people  have  been  killed  in  the  territory  since  the  start  of  the  conflict.
Correction  13th  February:  This  article  wrongly  reported  that  about  1,300  people  had  been  killed  following  the  7th  October  attack  by  Hamas.
This  was  based  on  counting  those  who  later  died  from  their  injuries  in  addition  to  the  figure  of  more  than  1,200.
